changeSet.sql:
PRINT N'Creating [dbo].[ForecastModels]...';
GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ForecastModels] ( [ForecastModelID] INT IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Code] NVARCHAR (MAX) NULL, [Name] NVARCHAR (MAX) NULL, [Description] NVARCHAR (MAX) NULL, [Identifier] UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NULL, [CreationDate] DATETIME2 (7) NULL, [UpdatedDate] DATETIME2 (7) NULL, [CreatedBy] INT NULL, [UpdateBy] INT NULL, [IsActive] BIT NULL, [IsDeleted] BIT NULL, [RowVersion] VARBINARY (MAX) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_ForecastModels] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ForecastModelID] ASC) );

changeSet.author: jbeam
jbeam
changeSet.sql:
PRINT N'Creating [dbo].[JobCodes]...';
GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[JobCodes] ( [JobCodeID] INT IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [JobCodeCode] NVARCHAR (MAX) NULL, [JobCodeName] NVARCHAR (MAX) NULL, [IsMaster] BIT NOT NULL, [IsGroup] BIT NOT NULL, [Description] NVARCHAR (MAX) NULL, [Identifier] UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NULL, [CreationDate] DATETIME2 (7) NULL, [UpdatedDate] DATETIME2 (7) NULL, [CreatedBy] INT NULL, [UpdateBy] INT NULL, [IsActive] BIT NULL, [IsDeleted] BIT NULL, [RowVersion] VARBINARY (MAX) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_JobCodes] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([JobCodeID] ASC) );
